Posts.Content: May 19, 2010 08:10PM kjlotus wrote: Hi there, I just finished my 7th reduced dose weekly taxol and herceptin - my hair is continuing to grow and stay put...i've got a dark (and some grey) cover all over my head - the longer fuzz on the top.  it's nice to have a head start on the hair regrowth.
Posts.Title: hair regrowth during taxol kjlotus kjlotus

Posts.Content: Apr 26, 2010 03:13PM kjlotus wrote: That gives me hope - with the weather getting warmer my heads getting hot under my cotton caps ;)  Plus, I'm just plain tired of wearing them!  I didn't get chemo 4 as scheduled last week because of my blood count (always something with those, it seems!) and my hair still keeps growing...hopefully it will continue.  Thanks!
Posts.Title: hair regrowth during taxol kjlotus kjlotus

Posts.Content: Jun 18, 2010 08:13PM kjlotus wrote: Yup - looks like my hair kept growing through the Taxol - was a nice surprise to get a head start on getting my hair back ;)

Posts.Content: kjlotus wrote: Hi there, I have had 3 taxol treatments (doing weekly taxol and herceptin) and my hair has been growing back.  My dr. said this was from the A/C chemo leaving my body (doxi something...).  Did this happen to anybody and did the regrowth start continue through the taxol or did it fall out again?  I'm sick of wearing hats!  ;) Thanks and good thoughts to all of you! KJ  Karen Dx 10/31/2009, ILC, 3cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 2, 6/20 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
